JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for an analytical thinker with experience in business or content policy to join our Policy team as a Product Policy Manager for our Creator & Community Policies. The team’s mission is to create and communicate rules for how our products may be used by creators, developers, and other communities on Facebook.As a Policy Manager, you will work closely with a number of other teams at Facebook and Instagram, including our policy enforcement teams, sales, legal, product, and our public policy teams. You will be responsible for understanding both Facebook and Instagram’s business priorities, and helping our team craft and implement policies that best serve the company and the people who use our services in these markets.Successful candidates will have experience in policy and/or policy enforcement and will be able to provide insights that will contribute to the shaping of our ads policies.
